info.title: AccuWeather
info.description: AccuWeather provides commercial weather forecasting services worldwide.

get.description: Returns basic information about administrative areas in the specified country.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country code to return administrative areas for

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Integer, along with the limit (25) that determines the first resource to be returned. If no offset is provided, the max number (100) of results will be returned.

get.description: Returns basic information about all countries within a specified region.

parameters.name: regionCode
parameters.description: The region code to return country list for

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

get.description: Returns basic information about all regions.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource.

get.description: Returns information for the top 50, 100, or 150 cities, worldwide.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: The number of cities to return.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.description: Returns basic information about locations matching an autocomplete of the search text.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Text to use for Autocomplete search.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

get.description: Returns information about a specific location, by GeoPosition (Latitude and Longitude).

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A comma-separated lat/long pair (lat,long).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.name: toplevel
parameters.description: When toplevel=true, the city with the highest rank will be returned. Large cities have higher rank than the neighborhoods within them, so toplevel=true delivers a more generic location result. (Example: 40.73,-74.00 returns Greenwich Village, NY when toplevel=false. If toplevel=true, the same lat/lon pair will return New York, NY.)

get.description: Returns daily forecast data for a specific location.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to display metric values.

get.description: Returns forecast data for the next hour(s) for a specific location.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to display metric values.

get.description: Returns current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.summary: Get Current Conditions for Top Cities
get.description: Returns current conditions data for the top 50, 100, or 150 cities worldwide, based on rank.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Group size, indicating how many cities to return. Valid values are 50, 100, or 150.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

get.description: Returns historical current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.description: Returns historical current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.summary: Get Daily Index Values for a Group of Indices
get.description: Returns daily index data for a specific group of indices, by location key.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: All index groups

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.summary: Get Daily Index Values for a Specific Index
get.description: Returns daily index data for a specific index, by location key. Not all daily indices data are available for retrieval, check (https://developer.accuweather.com/list-available-daily-indices)

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The index to get the values for. NOTE: Not all daily indices data are available for retrieval, Check: https://developer.accuweather.com/list-available-daily-indices

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.summary: Get Daily Index Values for for All Indices
get.description: Returns daily index data for all indices, by location key.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

get.description: Returns metadata for all daily indices.
Returns metadata for all index groups.

get.summary: Get List of Indices in a Specific Group
get.description: Returns metadata for all indices in a specified group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Index group ID

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

get.description: Returns information about a specific location, by location key. You must know the location key to perform this query.

parameters.description: Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.description: Whether or not to include full details in the response.

Date.description: The date for which the alarm exists, displayed in ISO8601 format.
Date.title: Date

EpochDate.description: Date of the forecast, displayed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (midnight UTC/GMT).
EpochDate.title: Epoch Date

AlarmType.description: Type of alarm in effect: Rain, Ice, Snow, Wind, WindGust, or Thunderstorm.
AlarmType.title: Alarm Type

MobileLink.description: Link to the daily forecast for the requested location on AccuWeather`s mobile site.
MobileLink.title: Mobile Link

Link.description: Link to the daily forecast for the requested location on AccuWeather`s web site.
Link.title: Link

get.description: Returns metadata for all languages.
Lists groups of phrases that are available for translation.

LanguageCode.description: Culture code of the language, for which the phrase is translated.
LanguageCode.title: Language Code

PhraseCode.description: Word (or phrase - without spaces) to use as a key for joining the translations.
PhraseCode.title: Phrase Code

parameters.name: groupID
parameters.description: The string indicating the group ID in which to return the resource.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The string indicating the language in which to return the resource.

get.summary: List the translations for a specific group
get.description: Returns all translated phrases for a specific group, in the desired language.

AlertID.description: Unique numeric id that identifies an alert for a particular country.
AlertID.title: Alert ID

Localized.description: Description of the alert in the local dialect set with language code in URL. Default is US English (en-us).
Localized.title: Localized

English.description: Description of the alert in US English.
English.title: English

Priority.description: Number signifying the importance or ranking order of the given alert within the country in which it has originated. A lower number signifies a higher priority. For example, 1 is the highest priority.
Priority.title: Priority

Type.description: Abbreviated form of the alert description.
Type.title: Type

TypeId.description: ID associated with the alert description.
TypeId.title: Type ID

Class.description: Classification of the alert. Not available for all countries.
Class.title: Class

Level.description: Severity identifier for the alert. Not available for all countries.
Level.title: Level

Red.description: The red RGB component of the color.
Red.title: Red

Green.description: The green RGB component of the color.
Green.title: Green

Blue.description: The blue RGB component of the color.
Blue.title: Blue

Hex.description: The hexadecimal number that describes the color.
Hex.title: Hex

SourceId.description: ID associated with the provider of the alert data.
SourceId.title: Source ID

Disclaimer.description: Disclaimer that must be displayed with the alert data.
Disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

Name.description: Name of the area that encompasses the location that was requested and falls under the current alert.
Name.title: Name

StartTime.description: Start time of the alert, displayed in ISO8601 format.
StartTime.title: Start Time

EpochStartTime.description: Start time of the alert, displayed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (midnight UTC/GMT). May be NULL.
EpochStartTime.title: Epoch Start Time

EndTime.description: End time of the alert, displayed in ISO8601 format.
EndTime.title: End Time

EpochEndTime.description: End time of the alert, displayed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (midnight UTC/GMT). May be NULL.
EpochEndTime.title: Epoch End Time

Localized.description: Status of the alert in the local dialect set with language code in URL. Default is US English (en-us).
Localized.title: Localized

English.description: Status of the alert in US English.
English.title: English

Text.description: Full text associated with the alert.
Text.title: Text

get.description: Returns links to radar and satellite images by location key. Imagery searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain a location key for your desired location. Radar images are not available for all locations worldwide at this time. If radar is not available for your desired location, satellite images are still provided.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The requested resolution.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: The unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The string indicating the language in which to return the resource.

x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: This is a Copilot plugin for the AccuWeather weather service. It can return forecasts, current conditions, and historical conditions.
